mapper.insert: insert into goods (name, `desc`, price, picture, discount, order_num, category_id) values (#{name}, #{desc}, #{price}, #{picture}, #{discount}, #{orderNum}, #{categoryId})
mapper.select: select id, name, `desc`, price, picture, discount, order_num, category_id from goods where category_id = #{categoryId}
select id, name, `desc`, price, picture, discount, order_num, category_id from goods where name = #{name}
mapper.update: update goods SET name = #{good.name}, `desc` = #{good.desc}, price = #{good.price}, picture = #{good.picture}, discount = #{good.discount}, order_num = #{good.orderNum}, category_id = #{good.categoryId} where id = #{good.id}
mapper.select: select g.id, name, `desc`, `price`, picture, discount, order_num, category_id from category_recommend_goods c left join goods g on c.id = g.id
